title: Memorandum from the President to the Secretary of Homeland Security | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 06, 2009

 



Memorandum from the President to the Secretary of Homeland Security




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  _________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                      August 6, 2009    MEMORANDUM FOR THE SECRETARY OF HOMELAND SECURITY  SUBJECT: Assignment of Function Under Section 601 of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 By virtue of the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States, including section 301 of title 3, United States Code, I hereby assign to you the function of the President under section 601, title VI, Division A of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 (Public Law 111-5). You are authorized and directed to publish this memorandum in the Federal Register. BARACK OBAMA  # # #
